body_html:
I think there's only a two uses. One in variable_scope.py, as superclass of a private class _ReuseMode. The other in xla_client.py, as superclass of PaddingType, which is not part of the public API.

So it should be easy to get rid of entirely.

body:
I think there's only a two uses. One in variable_scope.py, as superclass of a private class _ReuseMode. The other in xla_client.py, as superclass of PaddingType, which is not part of the public API. 

So it should be easy to get rid of entirely.
